title: A tiny WebAssembly compiler
author: Schampu
content: readme.md mini-wasm let play itdescription: is small compiler, offering basic c- language compiles webassembly.syntax:i32 fact(i32 n) { (n == 0) { return 1; } return (n * fact(n - 1));};export i32 main(i32 , i32 b) { return (fact( + b));};pipeline:scanner: creates token array of inputparser: eats tokens generates ast of emitter: recursively walks ast (luke astwalker) clumps together uint8 array gets passed into webassemblyapi:contribution:feel free send kind pull request
